Question: Who is the author of the poem 'A Slumber Did My Spirit Seal'?

Option1: Love and romance
Option2: Nature and beauty

Option4: Time and change

Option1: A lively and vibrant landscape

Option3: They symbolize the inevitability of death
Option4: They reflect the fleeting nature of life

Option4: It avoids discussing the theme of memory
